ModMetaData.name: Fishing Is Fun
ModMetaData.author: JalapenoLabs
ModMetaData.description:
Upgrade the Odyssey DLC fishing experience, have your pawns slowly gain recreation while fishing and grant a mood buff after a long fishing session.
Fully customizable, you can change the mood buff required duration, enable/disable the mood buff, and enable/disable the recreation gain while fishing.
